posts.title: Ultra-Quiet Smart Garage Door Opener
posts.content: Avoid making a loud ruckus every time you drive in and out of your home by installing this ultra-quiet smart garage door opener. It features a remarkably silent 2HP motor, and can be fitted with a variety of extra modules like a speaker, park assist, and a fan.

posts.title: Bitcoin Hardware Wallet
posts.content: Ensure your digital cryptocurrency remains safe from would be digital thieves by storing it inside this Bitcoin hardware wallet. The wallet is easy to set up and automatically pops up on your browser and populates the transaction fields when you go to pay with Bitcoin.

posts.title: Toilet Mini-Golf
posts.content: Work on your stroke while you do work on the porcelain throne with this mini-golf putting game. Perfect for any size bathroom, the toilet mini-golf game is a great gift idea for the golfing enthusiast and comes with a putting green, two balls, and a mini putter.

posts.title: nCamp Collapsible Wood Burning Stove
posts.content: The easy-to-use, durable, and affordable nCamp wood burning stove has a collapsible combustion chamber, burns wood and/or solid/liquid fuels, and has a no-bulk design that weighs under 2lbs and can be folded down to the size of a paperback book.

posts.title: Fingerprint Gun Safe
posts.content: Don’t just keep your gun a little bit safe — keep it completely locked down with the fingerprint gun safe. The fingerprint gun case only allows authorized fingerprints to access the safe, so you can store you guns without worry of unwanted use.

posts.title: Coat Rack And Storage Organizer
posts.content: Keep your everyday essentials conveniently at hand using this coat rack and storage organizer. The structure comes with four sturdy hooks, three key rings, and a combination of slots and compartments that are ideal for storing your stuff.

posts.title: Relaxing Ocean Waves Projector
posts.content: Give your home a soothing ambiance that’ll keep you happy by mellowing out to this relaxing ocean waves projector. It projects a series of calming ocean waves onto the ceiling and nearby walls to transform your room into an underwater oasis of tranquility.

posts.title: Handbook For The Recently Deceased
posts.content: Ensure you’re prepared for your journey into the afterlife by studying the Handbook For The Recently Deceased. This unique prop is handmade with meticulous detail to resemble the one from the unforgettable Beetlejuice movie.

posts.title: Gummy Bear Anatomy Model
posts.content: Learn more about those delicious little sugary treats you’ve eaten since childhood by analyzing this gummy bear anatomy model. This 41-piece puzzle offers a fun and interactive way to become an anatomical expert as you piece together their savory little body.

posts.title: Voice & Motion Activated Prank Stickers
posts.content: Watch people make complete asses of themselves with help from these motion and voice activated prank stickers. Just place them right onto any water fountain, hand dryer, or paper towel disposer and let the show begin.

posts.title: Full Body Resistance Training Suit
posts.content: This full body resistance training suit proves that you don’t need an expensive gym membership to get a heart-pumping workout. After strapping the lightweight harness, the extending rubber bands will provide added resistance to your entire body.

posts.title: Edible Dehydrated Zebra Tarantulas
posts.content: Take your taste buds for a walk on the wild side by sinking your teeth into an edible dehydrated zebra tarantula. Each little protein-packed critter comes fully boiled, dehydrated, and seasoned with a light hint of barbecue for an exotic taste.
